article_title: What Should We Do About Expensive Drugs?

article_metadata.description: Let’s say a drug has been shown to extend the life of terminally ill patients by months or even years. How much should we pay for it? Is there such a thing as a drug’s being too expensive? If we say “yes,” aren’t we putting a price on what a [...]
